name: Trails Amidst the Forest Fog
title: Ororon: Trails Amidst the Forest Fog
in_play_description: The first Electro-Charged reaction you trigger each Round deals +1 Piercing DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Ororon to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Fast Action: Equip this to your Ororon.
The first Electro-Charged reaction you trigger each Round deals +1 Piercing DMG.
(You must have Ororon in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
